sentences.en: Cells divide and renew as part of the human growth process.
sentences.cn: 细胞不断地分裂更新，这是人体发育过程的一部分。

sentences.en: Drivers have ten days'grace to renew their licenses.
sentences.cn: 驾驶员更换执照有10天的宽限期.

sentences.en: I avail myself of this opportunity to renew to you the assurances of my highest consideration.
If you can't finish the book by then, you must come and renew it.
sentences.cn: 这本书如果你到时候还看不完, 就必须来续借.

sentences.en: It would be a pleasure to renew acquaintances. "
sentences.cn: 真想再一次见到他们呢.

sentences.en: It's impossible to renew one's youth.
Larry's landlord threatened not to renew his lease.
sentences.cn: 拉里的房东威胁说不跟他续租。

sentences.en: Local people have renewed their efforts to save the school.
sentences.cn: 当地居民再一次作出努力，挽救这所学校。

sentences.en: Many hoped he would renew the country's atrophied political system.
sentences.cn: 很多人都期望他能使该国萎靡的政治体系振作起来。

sentences.en: Neither one of there wanted to renew their old marriage.
sentences.cn: 他们双方都不想恢复当年的夫妻关系.

sentences.en: People had to renew their motor vehicle registrations through the mail.
sentences.cn: 人们必须以书信方式重新登记机动车辆。

sentences.en: Police renewed their appeal for witnesses.
sentences.cn: 警察再次呼吁目击者出来作证。

sentences.en: The most important thing is to renew your health.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是恢复你的健康.

sentences.en: The trees renew their foliage every year.
sentences.cn: 树木每年都重新长出叶子。

sentences.en: The window frames need to be renewed.
We must renew our supplies of coal.
sentences.cn: 我们必须补充煤的储备.

sentences.en: We went to renew our monthly season ticket.

words.tran_cn: 可再生的；可更新的；可继续的
更新，恢复；复兴；补充；革新；续借；重申

trans.tran_cn: 重新开始，更新，恢复，重申，延长(执照、合同等)的有效期，使（受到损毁或丢失后）重获新生
trans.tran_en: to begin doing something again after a period of not doing it

trans.tran_cn: 使…续期； 重新开始； 重申； 修复
trans.tran_en: to begin doing something again after a period of not doing it
